items.sentence: There are a lot of things that have changed since you were last here.
I've always wanted to play a church organ and pull out all the stops.
I met a man yesterday that I didn't know, but he knew a lot about me.
I admit that I was hesitant to speak to you the first time I saw you.
That wasn't the first time I'd met Tom. I'd met him somewhere before.
How much time does it usually take you to get dressed in the morning?
It probably wouldn't have been that difficult to do that by yourself.
Tom soon discovered that he knew more about science than his teacher.
By the time I was your age, I'd already been working for three years.
Kindness is a language which the blind can see and the deaf can hear.
